post.body: As in Jonathan Living Seagull? Seriously. Know I can look up but like idea of learning from real people rather than google.
Denise, OMGosh, no worries. BTW, I "tagged" you, need to send you blog comment on this. Hope it's OK, want U to be noticed.
Goddarnit, you make me LAUGH! So glad you followed me, unlikely I would have found you ;-)
Can't speak for liking ex-husband's but I do think my husband's ex-wife is an amazing mom & I love how they love their girls.
Thanks for the nice comment and for leaving a comment on my blog :-) We are destined to meet, hopefully soon.
Hi, there! So my writing about meat (the eating kind) is okay w/ you? ps quick look at your beta site, looks very interesting!
Are you a real buffalo or a beefalo. Raised and (sorry to ask) finished on pasture? That would be amazing!
Chocolate bomb
Stop!! Before it's too late! Seriously, sounds trite but have to drink their own KoolAid or get out.
Someone tweeted saying he/she was looking for you there, so yes, your name was in lights ;-) #hohoto
Re: new domain levels, too many already, seems a terrible idea to have more - good only for scammers/squatters.
That is one very fat dog!
Sadly still IE but because computer already unstable, every time I make changes like that, blue screen of death. Thkg Mac.
Late response to your coral jewelry comment. That's a really good point, hadn't thought of it. Thanks!
Yah, but how much once you get the software in there, too? Running a start-up here ;-)
Congrats on the Today Show debut!
Thanks! I should give a hat tip to @skydiver - HARO notice looking for unique conversation starters for New Year's :-)
Curveball caught, I'm in! #arts&crafts #thmvmnt
Gosh I love NPR.
Absolutely, DM on it's way :-) Free Sirloins, too - they're ugly but well-aged so they're flavorful and tender.
Oh, what a great idea for a X-Mas party. Should expand it to Ugly Christmas Sweaters & Accessories.
Oh thank goodness you've posted that recipe for Honey Lavender Caramels
Still have this image of you on top of that hot-air balloon what was it, drinking tea? Yikes!
As I said 2 @TheStew, we gotta come up w/ better name than Boston Butt, even if as @culinarysherpas says more people will buy it.
Oh, I so wish. We went broke getting married in Sabaudia and spending 5 days in Roma this summer while the dollar was at peak!
Too bad author didn't note that Tenderloin/Filet Mignon is part of the Porterhouse ;-) But that does look like heaven 2 me!
Well, that was a pain to rebuild that list! Glad the new version will confirm randow slip ups (ps when does it come out?)
Oh no!!! And you were on it :-) Thanks for the quick answer.
Curious that Toronto twitterers don't connect/follow. Why?
I was tagged by @kidappeal. Learn my darkest secrets :-) http://tr.im/2d2f
Just realized I've been tagged! Anyone want to be tagged plz send dm. (Thanks @kidappeal.)
About 2 call 911 b/c Toronto Water ppl & non-emerg Fire Dept' #s don't answer. Hydrant in front of house leaking. Where do my taxes GO? Grr
Creepy twitterers - the ones who follow U but whose accounts R suspended by Twitter for bizarre activity - best to ignore or formally block?
Off to the slopes! Consolation prize 4 not being able 2 go home 2 SF 4 holidays. Happy holidays / Merry Christmas all, in case no Internet!
French Kisses and steaks could be a nice combination. http://tr.im/2mbs
You know you're a beef geek when you can recognize a Jersey from a photo. Thanks, @cowartandmore :-)
Wow. May be a repeat but tonight's PBS "Nature" is fabulous. @CurlyBill I think I saw some of your relatives!
Will stop for now. Was really excited that someone asked. We can so make a difference, and we will.
Problem is we've oversimplified beef (meat) for the sake of expediency & cheap prices. Grade contributes maybe 1/3 - what about other 2/3?
For @TweetDeck users, one of my groups just disappeared while scrolling - just poof and gone. Anyone know how to get it back?
